name: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: A classic Cabernet Sauvignon/Petite Sirah with a nose of blackcurrants, dark chocolate, and subtle toasty notes with hints of coffee and vanilla on the palate.

name: Moda'
description: This easy red offers bright aromas of red cherry and crushed blackberry on the nose, alongside a hint of fresh herbs and citronella. It's light and smooth on the palate, with delicate tannins and a mild bitter cherry pit note on the finish. Alexander Peartree
